title: 1957 Graphic Arts Service Postcard Detroit Tiger Reno Bertoia
author: Greenmonster

posts.post_title: 1957 Graphic Arts Service Postcard Detroit Tiger Reno Bertoia
posts.post_content: 1957 Graphic Arts Service Postcard Detroit Tiger Reno Bertoia, top left corner crease, postmarked from Reno's home town of Windsor Ontario, 1957.  $20.00 ppd.  Paypal F&F (JSRNA@aol.com), money order or check.  Thank you.  Jim
